summary: Investigated a terminal error where the runme command failed due to macOS cat command not supporting the -c flag. The error occurred when trying to execute a command from CONTRIBUTING.md that uses Linux-specific cat syntax. Provided solutions including installing GNU coreutils via Homebrew or using alternative commands like hexdump or od.
current_status: Identified compatibility issue between Linux and macOS cat command syntax. Ready to help implement a solution once the user specifies their intended use case.
